episode.summary: This episode is a sidestory! Gintama has been involved in many (one-sided) crossovers. This time, they`re working with the Jump comedy manga Sket Dance! An episodic anime that airs on Thursdays at 6 PM about a group of three odd jobbers with plenty of laughs and tears... Sounds very similar to Gintama. As Gintoki warns that the Sket Dan is coming after Gintama, the Sket Dan members appear and offer a challenge! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人は皆パジャマっ子
Everybody Loves Pajamas
Hito wa Mina Pajamakko
episode.summary: Gintoki continues creating havoc in the prison.

episode.title: プ○ズンブ×イクシーズン2って確かにもうプリ××ブレ○クしてるけどあれはこの腐った社会がプリズンってことだからプ○ズンブ×イクでいいんだよ
So in the Second Season of Prison Break, They`re Already Broken Out of Prison, But the Name Works Once You Realize That Society is a Prison
Prison Break Season 2 tte Tashika ni Mou Prison Break Shiteru kedo Are wa Kono Kusatta Shakai ga Prison tte Koto Dakara Prison Break de Iin Da yo
episode.summary: Gintoki gets thrown in prison after being framed, and while he`s made an enemy of the warden, he`s managed to become the boss of the prisoners. With his underling Shachi in tow, Gintoki skips his menial labor duties to search the warden`s room for anything incriminating. Understanding that the punishment will be fatal if they are caught, Gintoki disguises himself by putting on pajamas...

episode.title: 青と赤のエクスタシー
Blue and Red Ecstasy
Aka to Ao no Ecstasy
episode.summary: The Yorozuya run into a mysterious Blu-ray DVD with a depressed female ghost in it. The ghost moves into their TV, making all the programs gloomy as well. Gintoki then attempts to find use for the ghost as a navigator.

episode.title: おっさんの家庭事情はハード ハートはソフト
The Man`s Household Situation is Hard, His Heart is Soft
Ossan no Katei Jijou wa Daibu Hard Heart wa Soft
episode.summary: Katsura infiltrates Matsudaira`s household and ends up pondering family values.

episode.title: 名は体を表す
The Name Reveals the Person
Na wa Tai o Arawasu
episode.summary: The monkey, aka "Jugem Jugem... (abbreviated) Runny Diarrhea," has grown close to Kyubei. However, their time together did not last. The Shogun family ordered that the Yagyu return Runny Diarrhea. The monkey escapes from the Shogun family to see Kyubei again. Kyubei and the other Yagyu members are forced to continue a desperate and fruitless search for Runny Diarrhea... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 寿限無
Jugem
Jugemu
episode.summary: The monkey, aka "Jugem Jugem... (abbreviated) Runny Diarrhea," has grown close to Kyubei. However, their time together did not last. The Shogun family ordered that the Yagyu return Runny Diarrhea. The monkey escapes from the Shogun family to see Kyubei again. Kyubei and the other Yagyu members are forced to continue a desperate and fruitless search for Runny Diarrhea.

episode.title: 銭湯では身も心も丸裸
The Bathhouse, Where You`re Naked in Body and Soul
Sentou de wa Shin mo Maruhadaka
episode.summary: Gin, Kondo, Hijkata, Okita, and Shin are stuck in the public bath with the demons. Every lie they tell digs their grave deeper. Can they really get away with kicking heads in, ripping off horns, and setting demons on fire with lotion?

episode.title: 人はしらないうちに借りパクという罪を犯している
People Forget to Return Stuff All the Time Without Even Realizing It
Hito wa Shiranai Uchi ni Kari Park to Iu Tsumi o Okashite Iru
episode.summary: Kagura helps a iwamatsu, the last part have the yoruzuya and shinsengumi in the bathhouse just as neighbor Hedero arrives with family members visiting Edo.

episode.title: カニのハサミは絆を断つハサミ
The Pincers of a Crab Can Snip Through a Friendship
Kani no Hasami wa Kizuna o Tatsu Hasami
episode.summary: Otose sent a box of crab to the Yoruzuya. Before they can divide the crab`s legs to themselves, suddenly, there came a blackout after the electricity came back one leg is missing and Gintoki ate it. Another blackout came and another leg was missing and Kagura ate it, saying she was attacked by a gorilla. Shinpachi then put up a candle. Then Gintoki and Kagura ate all of the legs. When Shinpachi claims the crab`s whole body they found themselves fighting for a crab congee and ended up eating crab-flavored cheap food.

episode.title: 二度あることは三度ある
What Happens Twice Can Happen Thrice
Ni-Do Aru Koto wa San-Do Aru
episode.summary: Gintoki and Hasegawa have to help the shogun when he is at the pool.

episode.title: 工場見学とか正直一つたりとも記憶に残ってねェ
I Can`t Remember a Damn Thing About the Factory Tour
Koujou Kengaku to ka Shoujiki Hitotsutari to mo Kioku ni Nokotte ne?
episode.summary: Kagura invites a bunch of kids to the Yorozuya. They, along with other characters get shunned by them and invites them into a "factory tour".

episode.title: Ending 2
愛にプラスもマイナスもなし
Love is Neither Plus Nor Minus
Ai ni Plus mo Minus mo Nashi
episode.summary: Shinpachi introduces his new girlfriend to Otae...but she turns out to be Momo-san, a character from the popular Love Choris game. There are more and more boys in Edo who can no longer distinguish game from reality like Shinpachi. Otae asks Gintoki to bring Shinpachi back to the real world. The only way is by entering the world of Love Choris and talking some sense into him. Gintoki ends up choosing a very unique heroine to be his girlfriend... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 渡る世間は愛ばかり
Making It Through Love
Wataru Seken wa Ai Bakari
episode.summary: Gintoki is participating in the My Wife World Tournament so he can cure Shinpachi of his addiction to the romance simulation game Love Choris. The tournament involves in-game dates with the heroines. In the Momo group, Shinpachi uses a passive approach to dominate the other players! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ここのタイトルもメールのタイトルみたいなトコも考えるのメンド臭え
It Would Take Too Much Effort to Make This Title Sound Like a Text Message Subject
Koko no Title mo Mail no Title Mitai na Toko mo Kangaeru no Mendokusae
episode.summary: Kagura begs Gintoki for a cell phone, but the tight Odd Jobs budget won`t allow for one. That`s when they discover three cell phones in Sadaharu`s poop! They immediately have the technical whiz Gengai fix the phones and each member gets one. Kagura is ecstatic to have a cell phone, but Gintoki and Shinpachi are annoyed by her incessant texting... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宇宙ブルルン滞在記
Space Ururun Homestay
Uchuu Bururun Taizaiki
episode.summary: Katsura and the Odd Jobs members learn the truth about Elizabeth`s disappearance from his former lover, Fumiko. He was actually a spy from the legendary mercenary tribe, the Renho. Fumiko asks them to protect Earth and Elizabeth from the Renho. Meanwhile, a strange rain is turning the faces of the people of Edo with Elizabeth faces who can only communicate with signs! The invasion of the Renho army has begun. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忘れっぽい奴は忘れた頃にやってくる
The People You Tend to Forget Tend to Show Up After You Forget Them
Wasureppoi Yatsu wa Wasureta Koro ni Yattekuru
episode.summary: Elizabeth vanishes, leaving behind a sign that says "Don`t look." Katsura asks Odd Jobs to help look for him, but then he remembers that it`s been a year since he last saw Elizabeth. He never even realized that Elizabeth had left home! They decide to go to Katsura`s home to search for clues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 葬式って初めていくと意外とみんな明るくてビックリする
When You Go to a Funeral For the First Time, You`re Surprised by How Happy the People Are
Soushiki tte Hajimete Iku to Igai to Minna Akarukute Bikkuri suru
episode.summary: Odd Jobs attends the funeral for the owner of the restaurant they frequented. A few Shinsengumi members are also present. Gintoki and Hijikata, known for their bizarre sense of taste, lament the loss of one of Edo`s treasures... As the funeral proceeds, the dead owner suddenly makes a move!! Only Gintoki and Hijikata can see him... But when they try to escape from the owner... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 4
Ending 3
Opening 2
空の星
Empty Planet
Kara no Hoshi
episode.summary: Gintoki and Sakamoto reveal themselves and attack the Double Dragon generals. Meanwhile, Elizabeth has launched in the Gunsam to battle Dark Vader in a duel to the death. Elizabeth is helpless against Dark Vader. That is when Katsura arrives to protect his friend`s back! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千両箱とガラクタの箱
Piggy Banks and Trash Cans
Senryoubako to Garakuta no Hako
episode.summary: Odd Jobs, Katsura, and Sakamoto disguise themselves as Renho to join Fumiko in infiltrating the enemy base. Dark Vader, feared by all as the evil lord, plans to use the Renho`s anti-samurai Gunsams to attack while the people of Earth are distracted by the rain. Gintoki and the others must stop the invasion of Earth before it`s too late, but instead they appear to be bonding with the Renho. That is when Elizabeth, General Eren, appears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さよなライオネルなんか言わせない
Don`t Say Goodbye Lionel Will You Survive
Sayonara Lionel Nanka Iwasenai
episode.summary: Gintoki and co have launched in the Galactic Merchant Fleet Robot Kaien to take out Dark Vader. Having made peace with the Renho, they now fight for their pride as Earthlings and samurai against Dark Vader, who has become one with the Renho home planet. Will they be able to restore peace to the universe? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 拙者をスキーにつれてって
Please Take Me Skiing
Sessha o Ski ni Tsuretette
episode.summary: Matsudaira forces the Shinsengumi to take a vacation to the ski slopes. He tells them to enjoy their time off, but in reality, they`ve been sent to guard the Shogun on his first snowboard trip. The Shinsengumi members are doing their best to protect the Shogun since their lives are on the line, but then they run into some familiar faces... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 慰安旅行はイヤンどこォ!?
A Vacation in Disorientation
Ian Ryokou wa Iyan Doko!?
episode.summary: The Shinsengumi is tricked into escorting the Shogun on his first snowboarding trip. Then they run into the Odd Jobs members. Yada yada, everybody`s stranded in the middle of the mountains, plus the Shogun is missing. Hijikata orders a search for the Shogun while securing warm shelter. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忘年会でも忘れちゃいけないものがある
You know those year-end parties where you keep drinking until you`ve forgotten everything that happened the past year? There are a few things you`re not supposed to forget
Bounenkai Demo Wasurecha Ikenai Mono ga Aru
episode.summary: It`s a year-end party at Odd Jobs! The Gintama anime has been through a lot, but Gintoki tells Kagura and Shinpachi to keep it cool. And then the usual members join in for some real partying... The next morning, Gintoki wakes up to discover that he`s made some very bad mistakes. Will Gin-san be able to survive the worst blunder in five years of Gintama!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人は忘れることで生きていける
People can Only Live by Forgetting the Bad
Hito wa Wasureru Koto de Ikite Ikeru
episode.summary: After getting drunk at the year-end party, Gintoki managed to become a six-timer in one night. In order to prevent the show from being pulled off the air, Gintoki is forced into engaging in a relationship with all of them. And now he has to go on dates with all of them at the same time...! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アルファベット表記で人類みなホスト
We Are All Hosts, in Capital Letters
Alphabet Hyouki de Jinrui Mina Host
episode.summary: The number one host in the Kabuki district, Kyoshiro, summons the Odd Jobs members to his club, Takamagahara, and tells them that he intends to quit because of a lady named Madame Yagami who controls the night world. It seems that she declared she would be making a second visit to Takamagahara, which is essentially a death sentence. The hosts at Kyoshiro`s have quit out of fear, so Gintoki and co must find hosts to handle the Madame... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ごめんなさい
We`re Sorry
Gomennasai
episode.summary: Its last episode and we are going out with a bang. A Gintama clip show! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コタツで寝る時は○玉熱しないよう気をつけろ
When Sleeping Under a Kotatsu, Make Sure You Don`t Burn Your Balls
Kotatsu de Neru Toki wa Kintama Nesshinai You Ki o Tsukero
episode.summary: Nobody cares anymore, the animators, producers, not even Hideaki Sorachi. Aww, it’s such a drag even the characters are airing their grievances. Where do we go from here? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お年玉は×ネタとの相性がバツグン
New Year`s Envelopes Are Perfect for Dirty Jokes
Otoshidama wa Neta to no Aishou ga Batsugun
episode.summary: Gin is trying to hand out New Year Envelopes but the lack of children characters make it hard. To make matters worse, everyone seems to have their mind wrapped around long cylindrical objects and small spherical objects. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 贈り物はお早めに
Presents Are Meant to Be Given Early
Okurimono wa Ohayame ni
episode.summary: A character from 2 years ago is back with a request for Gin. This favor will take the Odd-Job Trio right in the middle of Satan Festival in this very special Christmas episode. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マダオドッグマダオネア
Madaodog Madaonaire
Madaodog Madaonaire
episode.summary: The middle-aged dumb-ass oldie, or Madao, Taizo Hasegawa finds himself on a game show with a chance to win ten million yen. Will he be able to endure the pressure and become a Madaonaire!? And what is Madao`s motivation for participating in the game show...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バラガキからの手紙
Letter from Thorny
Baragaki kara no Tegami
episode.summary: The Shinsengumi attempt to save Tetsunosuke from the Check It Out gang, but the Mimawarigumi stands in the way. Neither side is willing to back down, but Gintoki, who had infiltrated the gang as a Mimawarigumi spy, manages to save Tetsunosuke! Kondo orders the Shinsengumi to begin fighting back! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪ガキどもの祭典
Festival of Thornys
Warugaki-domo no Saiten
episode.summary: Tetsunosuke has been ordered to deliver a letter for Hijikata. However, he`s captured by the radical Joi Check It Out gang in the process. Tetsunosuke had concealed his identity to join the gang, but now they know that he has connections to the police. He`s taken hostage as leverage over the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi. However, the Mimawarigumi shows no concern for the hostage and plots to place the blame squarely on the Shinsengumi. Hijikata and the other members are enraged after learning Isaburo`s plans. The Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi are now in an all-out fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 茨ガキと薔薇ガキ
Thorny and Rosy
Ibaragaki to Baragaki
episode.summary: Tetsunosuke has completely changed as he sincerely tries to perform his new job. Isaburo despises Tetsunosuke and tells Hijikata that he should dispose of him, but Hijikata, who came from a similar background, sympathizes with Tetsunosuke and looks after him. Meanwhile, Gintoki, who was arrested by the Mimawarigumi, has been assigned a mission by Isaburo... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チェケラ!!
Check It Out!!
Chekera!!
episode.summary: The Sasaki family is as elite as it gets, and one of its members, Tetsunosuke, has joined the Shinsengumi. He would have joined the Mimawarigumi, a police force with pedigree, but he is considered a troublemaker, which is why he was sent to the Shinsengumi. Kondo assigns Tetsu to Hijikata as an assistant, so Hijikata is forced to endure the new recruit... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漫画という画布に人生という筆で絵を描け
Draw Your Life on the Canvas We Call Manga
Manga Toiu Gafu ni Jinsei Toiu Fude de eo Egake
episode.summary: Jellybeans Vanguard Honda is on his fifth year as a Jump editor. However, he`s been assigned to the manga Gintaman, which has driven multiple editors insane. In order to save himself, Honda must find a new talented artist so he can be reassigned. One day, he is visited by an aspiring manga artist by the name of N3016. Is this artist as juvenile as his name suggests? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女はベジータ好き 男はピッコロ好き
Girls Like Vegeta, Guys Like Piccolo
Onna wa Vegeta-zuki Otoko wa Piccolo-zuki
episode.summary: The Madame`s arrival is imminent. Kyoshiro, Gintoki, and friends attempt to scout some help, but they end up with a bunch of oddballs. And it turns out that Otae has invited guests from all over town who go wild and leave the bar and Kyoshiro broken! There`s no time to worry about taking care of customers. But at the worst possible time, Madame Yagami arrives! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 5
Opening 3
銀魂 桜祭り 2011
Cherry Blossom Festival (2011)
Sakura Matsuri (2011)
episode.summary: Like previous Gintama live event in 2010, special animated segments were shown. And also, live dubbing performance by the series` seiyuu to clips from Gintama (2006) and Gintama` (2011), live band performances and more.
